title: N100 ‚Äì NFT Marketplaces 101: Where the Magic Happens
description: Master Solana's top NFT marketplaces: Magic Eden and Tensor. Learn to navigate interfaces, understand liquidity, and place your first bids.
summary: A beginner course explaining NFT marketplaces like Magic Eden and Tensor. Includes walkthroughs, bid tutorials, and first assignments. Perfect for new Web3 users interested in NFT trading on Solana.
aiDescription: This course teaches beginners how to navigate and trade on Solana's top NFT marketplaces. Students learn to place bids, understand market dynamics, and execute their first NFT trades. The course includes hands-on demos and practical assignments.

modules.title: Welcome to the Marketplace
modules.description: An overview of Solana's top marketplaces: Magic Eden and Tensor. Learn what role they play in NFT trading, how liquidity works, and where most volume flows.

lessons.title: Understanding NFT Marketplaces
lessons.content:
NFT marketplaces are the digital equivalent of art galleries and auction houses, but for blockchain-based assets. They provide the infrastructure for buying, selling, and trading NFTs.

**Key Functions of Marketplaces:**
‚Ä¢ **Discovery**: Browse and discover new NFT collections
‚Ä¢ **Trading**: Buy, sell, and bid on NFTs
‚Ä¢ **Liquidity**: Provide market depth for price discovery
‚Ä¢ **Analytics**: Track floor prices, volume, and trends

**Solana's Top Marketplaces:**
‚Ä¢ **Magic Eden**: The largest Solana NFT marketplace
‚Ä¢ **Tensor**: Advanced trading platform for degens
‚Ä¢ **OpenSea**: Multi-chain marketplace (includes Solana)
‚Ä¢ **Solanart**: Early Solana marketplace

**Why Marketplaces Matter**:
Marketplaces are where price discovery happens and where most NFT trading volume flows. Understanding how to navigate them is crucial for successful NFT trading.

modules.title: Magic Eden Basics
modules.description: Learn how to navigate Magic Eden's interface: trending collections, floor price, listing activity, and how to place a bid or buy instantly.

lessons.title: Navigating Magic Eden
lessons.content:
**Magic Eden Interface Overview**:

**Homepage Features:**
‚Ä¢ Trending collections
‚Ä¢ Recent sales
‚Ä¢ Floor price updates
‚Ä¢ Featured drops

**Collection Pages:**
‚Ä¢ Floor price and volume stats
‚Ä¢ Listings with price filters
‚Ä¢ Trait rarity information
‚Ä¢ Sales history

**Trading Features:**
‚Ä¢ **Buy Now**: Purchase at listed price
‚Ä¢ **Place Bid**: Offer below floor
‚Ä¢ **List for Sale**: Set your asking price
‚Ä¢ **Cancel Listing**: Remove your listing

**Key Metrics to Watch:**
‚Ä¢ Floor price (lowest listed price)
‚Ä¢ 24h volume
‚Ä¢ Number of listings
‚Ä¢ Recent sales
‚Ä¢ Unique holders

lessons.title: Placing Bids and Buying
lessons.content:
**How to Place a Bid:**
1. Navigate to the collection page
2. Click 'Place Bid' on any NFT
3. Enter your bid amount (in SOL)
4. Set bid duration (1-7 days)
5. Confirm transaction

**How to Buy Instantly:**
1. Find an NFT you want
2. Click 'Buy Now'
3. Review the price and fees
4. Confirm the transaction
5. NFT transfers to your wallet

**Bid Strategy Tips:**
‚Ä¢ Start with small bids to test the market
‚Ä¢ Monitor bid activity and adjust accordingly
‚Ä¢ Consider placing multiple bids across different NFTs
‚Ä¢ Set realistic bid amounts based on floor price

**Risk Management:**
‚Ä¢ Never bid more than you can afford to lose
‚Ä¢ Factor in marketplace fees (usually 2-3%)
‚Ä¢ Consider gas fees for transactions
‚Ä¢ Have a clear exit strategy

modules.title: Tensor Deep Dive
modules.description: Explore Tensor's advanced trader view: bid walls, snipe tools, listings feed, and analytic tabs. Understand why degens prefer it.

lessons.title: Tensor's Advanced Features
lessons.content:
**Why Traders Love Tensor:**

**Advanced Analytics:**
‚Ä¢ Real-time floor price tracking
‚Ä¢ Volume and liquidity analysis
‚Ä¢ Trait rarity breakdowns
‚Ä¢ Historical price charts

**Trading Tools:**
‚Ä¢ **Bid Walls**: See all active bids
‚Ä¢ **Snipe Tools**: Quick purchase options
‚Ä¢ **Listings Feed**: Real-time new listings
‚Ä¢ **Bulk Operations**: Multi-NFT trading

**Interface Advantages:**
‚Ä¢ Cleaner, more professional layout
‚Ä¢ Better data visualization
‚Ä¢ Faster transaction processing
‚Ä¢ More detailed collection stats

**Key Differences from Magic Eden:**
‚Ä¢ More advanced trading features
‚Ä¢ Better analytics and data
‚Ä¢ Faster transaction speeds
‚Ä¢ More professional interface
‚Ä¢ Advanced filtering options

lessons.title: Using Tensor's Trading Tools
lessons.content:
**Bid Wall Analysis:**
‚Ä¢ View all active bids on a collection
‚Ä¢ Identify support levels
‚Ä¢ Understand market sentiment
‚Ä¢ Find undervalued NFTs

**Snipe Tools:**
‚Ä¢ Quick buy options for new listings
‚Ä¢ Automated bidding strategies
‚Ä¢ Price alert notifications
‚Ä¢ Instant purchase capabilities

**Listings Feed:**
‚Ä¢ Real-time new listings
‚Ä¢ Price change notifications
‚Ä¢ Trait-based filtering
‚Ä¢ Volume-based sorting

**Bulk Operations:**
‚Ä¢ Buy multiple NFTs at once
‚Ä¢ Place multiple bids simultaneously
‚Ä¢ Cancel multiple listings
‚Ä¢ Batch transactions for efficiency

**Pro Tips:**
‚Ä¢ Use bid walls to understand market depth
‚Ä¢ Set up alerts for price drops
‚Ä¢ Monitor listings feed for opportunities
‚Ä¢ Use bulk operations to save time

modules.title: Demo: Bid on a WifHoodie
modules.description: Walk through placing a bid on both platforms. Practice using a burner wallet and check what happens post-fill.

lessons.title: Step-by-Step Bid Demo
lessons.content:
**Demo: Placing a Bid on Magic Eden**

**Step 1: Connect Wallet**
‚Ä¢ Open Magic Eden in your browser
‚Ä¢ Connect your Phantom or Solflare wallet
‚Ä¢ Ensure you have SOL for the bid

**Step 2: Find WifHoodie Collection**
‚Ä¢ Search for 'WifHoodie' in the search bar
‚Ä¢ Click on the collection page
‚Ä¢ Review current floor price and listings

**Step 3: Place Your Bid**
‚Ä¢ Select an NFT you want to bid on
‚Ä¢ Click 'Place Bid' button
‚Ä¢ Enter your bid amount (e.g., 0.5 SOL)
‚Ä¢ Set bid duration (7 days recommended)
‚Ä¢ Review and confirm transaction

**Step 4: Monitor Your Bid**
‚Ä¢ Check your bid in the 'My Bids' section
‚Ä¢ Monitor if you get outbid
‚Ä¢ Adjust bid if needed

**What Happens if You Win:**
‚Ä¢ NFT automatically transfers to your wallet
‚Ä¢ SOL is deducted from your balance
‚Ä¢ You can list it for sale or hold

**What Happens if You Lose:**
‚Ä¢ SOL is returned to your wallet
‚Ä¢ No fees are charged
‚Ä¢ You can place new bids

lessons.title: Tensor Bid Demo
lessons.content:
**Demo: Placing a Bid on Tensor**

**Step 1: Navigate to Tensor**
‚Ä¢ Go to tensor.trade
‚Ä¢ Connect your wallet
‚Ä¢ Search for WifHoodie collection

**Step 2: Analyze the Market**
‚Ä¢ Check current floor price
‚Ä¢ Review bid wall activity
‚Ä¢ Look at recent sales
‚Ä¢ Analyze trait rarity

**Step 3: Place Strategic Bid**
‚Ä¢ Use bid wall to see current bids
‚Ä¢ Place bid slightly above floor
‚Ä¢ Set appropriate duration
‚Ä¢ Confirm transaction

**Step 4: Advanced Features**
‚Ä¢ Set up price alerts
‚Ä¢ Use snipe tools for quick purchases
‚Ä¢ Monitor listings feed
‚Ä¢ Use bulk operations if needed

**Key Differences from Magic Eden:**
‚Ä¢ More detailed analytics
‚Ä¢ Better bid wall visualization
‚Ä¢ Faster transaction processing
‚Ä¢ More professional interface
‚Ä¢ Advanced filtering options

**Pro Tips:**
‚Ä¢ Use Tensor for more serious trading
‚Ä¢ Leverage analytics for better decisions
‚Ä¢ Set up alerts for opportunities
‚Ä¢ Use bulk operations for efficiency

modules.title: Assignment: Place Your First Bid
modules.description: Choose a hoodie (or any NFT) and place a small bid using a test wallet. Screenshot it and post in the Decoder thread with your thoughts.

lessons.title: Your First Bid Assignment
lessons.content:
**Assignment: Place Your First Real Bid**

**Objective:**
Gain hands-on experience with NFT marketplaces by placing your first bid on a real NFT.

**Requirements:**
‚Ä¢ Use a test wallet with small amount of SOL
‚Ä¢ Place bid on any NFT collection
‚Ä¢ Document the process with screenshots
‚Ä¢ Share your experience in the Decoder thread

**Step-by-Step Instructions:**

**1. Prepare Your Wallet**
‚Ä¢ Create a test wallet (Phantom or Solflare)
‚Ä¢ Add a small amount of SOL (0.1-0.5 SOL)
‚Ä¢ Ensure you have enough for bid + gas fees

**2. Choose Your Target**
‚Ä¢ Pick any NFT collection you're interested in
‚Ä¢ Research current floor price
‚Ä¢ Identify a good entry point
‚Ä¢ Consider trait rarity and demand

**3. Place Your Bid**
‚Ä¢ Navigate to the collection on Magic Eden or Tensor
‚Ä¢ Select an NFT you want to bid on
‚Ä¢ Place a bid slightly below floor price
‚Ä¢ Set appropriate duration (3-7 days)
‚Ä¢ Confirm the transaction

**4. Document Your Experience**
‚Ä¢ Screenshot your bid placement
‚Ä¢ Record the bid amount and duration
‚Ä¢ Note your reasoning for the bid
‚Ä¢ Monitor the bid status

**5. Share Your Results**
‚Ä¢ Post screenshots in the Decoder thread
‚Ä¢ Share your thought process
‚Ä¢ Discuss what you learned
‚Ä¢ Ask questions about the experience

**Success Criteria:**
‚úÖ Successfully placed a bid
‚úÖ Documented the process
‚úÖ Shared experience in community
‚úÖ Learned from the experience

**Bonus Challenges:**
‚Ä¢ Try bidding on both Magic Eden and Tensor
‚Ä¢ Compare the user experience
‚Ä¢ Place multiple bids on different NFTs
‚Ä¢ Track your bid performance over time
